mapper.select: SELECT I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID, TO_CHAR(MAX(I.LIVE_DATE),'DD-MON-YYYY') LIVE_DATE, MAX(NVL(I.LDESC,'N/A')) LDESC, MAX(NVL(I.SDESC,'N/A')) SDESC, MAX(I.FILE_SIZE) FILE_SIZE, MAX(PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME) PRICE_MODEL_NAME, MAX(IP.BEST_PRICE) BEST_PRICE, MAX(NVL(IP.RENEWAL_PRICE,0)) RENEWAL_PRICE, MIN(IT.DISPLAY_NAME) ITEM_TYPE, MIN(I.NETWORK_AWARE) NETWORK_AWARE, DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true', 'IN',' ') PUB_FLAG, MAX(I.PHONE_PREVIEW_IMAGE) IMAGE_FILE, MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID, COUNT(I.ITEM_ID) noOfOrders FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_ITEM_PRICE IP, MF_ITEM_TYPE IT, MF_COMPANY C, MF_PRICE_MODEL PM WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.ITEM_ID = IP.ITEM_ID AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID = PM.PRICE_MODEL_ID AND I.ITEM_TYPE_ID = IT.ITEM_TYPE_ID GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID, DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true', 'IN', ' ') ORDER BY I.DEVELOPER_NAME,I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT D.DEVICE_NAME FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_ITEM_DEVICE_GROUP IDG, MF_DEVICE_GROUP_MAP DGM, MF_DEVICE D WHERE I.COMPANY_ID = #{compId} AND I.DEVELOPER_NAME = #{devName} AND I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME = #{dispName} AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE <SYSDATE AND I.ITEM_ID = IDG.ITEM_ID AND IDG.DEVICE_GROUP_ID = DGM.DEVICE_GROUP_ID AND DGM.DEVICE_ID = D.DEVICE_ID ORDER BY DEVICE_NAME

SELECT DISTINCT PN.NODE_NAME FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC, PP_CAT_NODE PN WHERE I.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND IC.NODE_ID = PN.NODE_ID AND I.COMPANY_ID = #{compId} AND I.DEVELOPER_NAME = #{devName} AND I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME = #{dispName} AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE ORDER BY NODE_NAME

SELECT IT.DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NUMBER_OF_ITEMS FROM (SELECT MIN(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID, MIN(I.ITEM_TYPE_ID) ITEM_TYPE_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X, MF_ITEM_TYPE IT WHERE X.ITEM_TYPE_ID = IT.ITEM_TYPE_ID GROUP BY X.ITEM_TYPE_ID, IT.DISPLAY_NAME HAVING COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) > 0 ORDER BY IT.DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT CN.NODE_ID, CN.DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM PP_CAT_NODE CN, (SELECT IC.NODE_ID, MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID, IC.NODE_ID) X WHERE X.NODE_ID = CN.NODE_ID GROUP BY CN.DISPLAY_NAME, CN.NODE_ID ORDER BY CN.DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT MIN(D.DEVICE_ID) DEVICE_ID,D.DEVICE_NAME, COUNT(DI.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM MF_DEVICE D, MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C, (SELECT DISTINCT DGM.DEVICE_ID, IDG.ITEM_ID FROM MF_DEVICE_GROUP_MAP DGM, MF_ITEM_DEVICE_GROUP IDG WHERE DGM.DEVICE_GROUP_ID = IDG.DEVICE_GROUP_ID) DI WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.STATUS = 1 AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND D.DEVICE_ID = DI.DEVICE_ID AND DI.ITEM_ID = I.ITEM_ID GROUP BY D.DEVICE_NAME ORDER BY D.DEVICE_NAME

SELECT PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM MF_ITEM_PRICE IP, MF_PRICE_MODEL PM, (SELECT MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X WHERE X.ITEM_ID = IP.ITEM_ID AND PM.PRICE_MODEL_ID = IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID GROUP BY PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME, IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID ORDER BY PM.PRICE_MODEL_DISPLAY_NAME

SELECT BEST_PRICE,COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM MF_ITEM_PRICE IP, (SELECT MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I, MF_COMPANY C, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND I.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND IC.NODE_ID = #{catId} AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X WHERE X.ITEM_ID = IP.ITEM_ID AND IP.PRICE_MODEL_ID <> #{pmId} GROUP BY BEST_PRICE ORDER BY BEST_PRICE DESC
SELECT DISTINCT BEST_PRICE FROM MF_ITEM_PRICE WHERE BEST_PRICE > 0 ORDER BY 1

SELECT D.DEVICE_NAME, CN.DISPLAY_NAME, COUNT(X.ITEM_ID) NO_OF_ITEMS FROM PP_CAT_NODE CN, MF_DEVICE D, MF_ITEM_CATEGORY IC, (SELECT MAX(I.ITEM_ID) ITEM_ID FROM MF_ITEM I WHERE I.LIVE_DATE IS NOT NULL AND I.LIVE_DATE < SYSDATE AND I.STATUS = 1 GROUP BY I.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME, I.DEVELOPER_NAME, I.COMPANY_ID) X, (SELECT DISTINCT DGM.DEVICE_ID, IDG.ITEM_ID FROM MF_DEVICE_GROUP_MAP DGM, MF_ITEM_DEVICE_GROUP IDG WHERE DGM.DEVICE_GROUP_ID = IDG.DEVICE_GROUP_ID) DI WHERE DI.ITEM_ID = X.ITEM_ID AND DI.DEVICE_ID = D.DEVICE_ID AND X.ITEM_ID = IC.ITEM_ID AND IC.NODE_ID = CN.NODE_ID GROUP BY D.DEVICE_NAME, CN.DISPLAY_NAME ORDER BY D.DEVICE_NAME, CN.DISPLAY_NAME
mapper.sql: AND O.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(TO_DATE(#{startDate, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.DateTypeHandler} || ' 00:00:00', 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS TIMESTAMP), '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${serverTimeZone}', 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss'), 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(FROM_TZ(CAST(TO_DATE(#{endDate, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.DateTypeHandler} || ' 23:59:59', 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AS TIMESTAMP), '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${serverTimeZone}', 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss'), 'DD-MON-YYYY hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT FROM_TZ(CAST(O.ORDER_DATE AS TIMESTAMP), '${serverTimeZone}') AT TIME ZONE '${carrier.carrierTimeZone}' ORDER_DATE, O.COMPANY_NAME, O.ITEM_ID, O.DEVICE_DISPLAY_NAME ITEM_NAME, DECODE(O.DISCOVERY_POINT_ID,153,'Postpaid',256,'Pre-Noncap',254,'Precap') CUST_TYPE, IT.ITEM_TYPE_NAME, NVL(IST.DISPLAY_NAME,'Theam/Bundle') ITEM_SUB_TYPE_NAME, DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true', 'direct', 'indirect') DIRECT_FLAG, O.SELL_PRICE, (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate}) NET_SALES, CASE WHEN SELL_PRICE = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NUMBER_OF_ZERO, CASE WHEN SELL_PRICE < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NUMBER_OF_REFUND, CASE WHEN SELL_PRICE > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END NUMBER_OF_ORDER,
NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE2, 0) CS_PCT,
DECODE (UPPER(#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0),0)) CM_PCT,
DECODE (UPPER(#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0),0)) CP_PCT,
(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE2, 0) / 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate}) CARRIR_SHARE,
DECODE (UPPER(#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0) / 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate}), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0) / 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate}) ,0)) CM_SHARE,
DECODE (UPPER(#{includeCP, typeHandler=com.cellmania.cmreports.db.handlers.BooleanTypeHandler}), 1,(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0) / 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate}), DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true',(NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0) / 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate}) ,0)) CP_SHARE,
DECODE(C.PUBLISHER_FLAG, 'true', ((NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0) / 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate})), (((NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE3, 0) / 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate}))+ ((NVL(S.REVENUE_SHARE, 0)/ 100) * (O.SELL_PRICE/#{carrier.taxRate})))) CARRIER_INVOICE
FROM MF_ORDER O, MF_ITEM_TYPE IT, MF_COMPANY C, MF_SETTLEMENT S,MF_ITEM_SUB_TYPE IST WHERE O.ORDER_TYPE IS NULL AND O.DISCOVERY_POINT_ID IN (153,254,256) AND O.ITEM_TYPE_ID = IT.ITEM_TYPE_ID AND O.ITEM_SUB_TYPE_ID = IST.SUB_TYPE_ID(+) AND O.COMPANY_ID = C.COMPANY_ID AND NVL(O.SETTLEMENT_ID, 0) = S.ID(+)
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'MM') ORDER_MONTH, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'MON-YY') ORDER_DATE, COMPANY_NAME, CUST_TYPE, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_TYPE_NAME, ITEM_SUB_TYPE_NAME, DIRECT_FLAG, SUM(SELL_PRICE) SELL_PRICE, SUM(NET_SALES) NET_SALES, SUM(NUMBER_OF_ORDER) NUMBER_OF_ORDER, SUM(NUMBER_OF_REFUND) NUMBER_OF_REFUND, SUM(NUMBER_OF_ZERO) NUMBER_OF_ZERO_ORDERS, CS_PCT, CM_PCT, CP_PCT, SUM(CARRIR_SHARE) CARRIR_SHARE, SUM(CM_SHARE) CM_SHARE, SUM(CP_SHARE) CP_SHARE, SUM(CARRIER_INVOICE) CARRIER_INVOICE FROM () GROUP BY COMPANY_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'MM'), TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'MON-YY'), CUST_TYPE, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_SUB_TYPE_NAME, ITEM_TYPE_NAME, DIRECT_FLAG, NUMBER_OF_ORDER, NUMBER_OF_REFUND, NUMBER_OF_ZERO, CS_PCT, CM_PCT, CP_PCT ORDER BY COMPANY_NAME, ORDER_MONTH, ORDER_DATE, CUST_TYPE, ITEM_TYPE_NAME, ITEM_NAME, DIRECT_FLAG

SELECT DIRECT_FLAG,CUST_TYPE,ITEM_TYPE_NAME,ITEM_SUB_TYPE_NAME, SUM(SELL_PRICE) SELL_PRICE, SUM(NET_SALES) NET_SALES, SUM(NUMBER_OF_ORDER) NUMBER_OF_ORDER, SUM(NUMBER_OF_REFUND) NUMBER_OF_REFUND, SUM(NUMBER_OF_ZERO) NUMBER_OF_ZERO_ORDERS, SUM(CARRIR_SHARE) CARRIR_SHARE, SUM(CM_SHARE) CM_SHARE, SUM(CP_SHARE) CP_SHARE, SUM(CARRIER_INVOICE) CARRIER_INVOICE FROM () GROUP BY DIRECT_FLAG,CUST_TYPE,ITEM_TYPE_NAME,ITEM_SUB_TYPE_NAME,NUMBER_OF_ORDER,NUMBER_OF_REFUND,NUMBER_OF_ZERO ORDER BY DIRECT_FLAG,CUST_TYPE,ITEM_TYPE_NAME
